extension.dc:title: Trait measurement method
extension.dc:description: The Darwin Core extension for genebanks (DwC germplasm) was developed in 2009 for sharing genebank datasets with the GBIF Integrated Publishing Toolkit from the Global Biodiversity Information Facility (GBIF). This application schema includes the terms to describe the descriptors used for trait measurements or so-called Characterization and Evaluation (C and E) data. These terms where developed by the EPGRIS3 group of the European Coopertive Programme for Plant Genetic Resources (ECPGR) in 2009.
extension.name: MeasurementMethod

property.name: measurementMethodID
property.dc:description: Persistent identifier for a trait descriptor used to identify the description of the measurement method.

property.name: measurementMethodName
property.dc:description: English name used to identify the trait measurement method.
property.examples: stem rust susceptibility; powdery mildew susceptibility; plant height; ear density

property.name: measurementMethodCategory
property.dc:description: Classification type for the trait descriptor.
property.examples: agrobotanical; morphological; chemical; phenological; molecular biology; disease susceptibility/-resistance; tolerance (abiotic); utilization

property.name: measurementMethodScale
property.dc:description: Measurement scale used to score the measurement values.
property.examples: absolute; interval; nominal; ordinal; ratio; relative

property.name: measurementMethodSource
property.dc:description: Reference to a standard Germplasm Descriptor. For example the UPOV descriptor or the Bioversity Crop Descriptor identifier.

property.name: measurementMethodRemarks
property.dc:description: Remarks related to the trait measurement method.
property.examples: inflorescences after cutting; measured three days after heading date
